judicialResults.label: Community order varied
judicialResults.resultText:
COV - Community order varied
Order made on 06/09/2025 by Lavender Hill Magistrates' Court varied. The end date of the order has been changed and the requirements must be complied with by 19/03/2026. The new and amended requirements are shown below. The responsible officer nominated is a probation officer. The supervising court is Lavender Hill Magistrates' Court.
